name: mapco2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(c3, c4, c2)), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, c4)))

stmt.origin: mp3an1(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(c3, c4, c2), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, c4)), wcel(c4, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(c3, c4, c2)), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, c4)))

-| wi(w3a(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(c3, c4, c2)), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, c4)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(c3, c4, c2)), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, c4)))

comment: Post-composition (renaming indices) of a mapping viewed as a point. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)
